tool_description: Detect the emotion expressed in the text.
name: Ekman Emotion Analysis
title: Ekman Emotion Analysis

api_list.name: Ekman Emotion Analysis
api_list.description:
Detect the emotion expressed in the text.
Supported language codes are: [ de, en, es ]
Retrieved emotions can be any of: [anger, disgust, fear, joy,no-emotion, sadness, surprise]
